notes: Gate output reported pass with case_count=241 and pass_count=241.
RCH worker execution emitted step-level logs and forensics index entries including iter_differential_cases and iter_adversarial_cases.

workflow_gate_runs.command: rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_workflow_scenario_gate -- --log-path target/workflow_scenario_packet004_e2e.jsonl --artifact-index-path target/workflow_scenario_packet004_artifact_index.json --report-path target/workflow_scenario_packet004_reliability.json --retries 1 --flake-budget 0 --coverage-floor 1.0
notes: Secondary gate run confirmed replay command emission and packet-specific iterator scenario coverage.
forensics_artifact_index included workflow corpus plus iterator differential/adversarial fixture collections.

quality_gates.command: rch exec -- cargo test -p fnp-conformance workflow_scenario_suite_is_green -- --nocapture

notes: Workflow step logs include fixture_id, seed, mode, env_fingerprint, artifact_refs, and reason_code via WorkflowScenarioLogEntry.
Packet-004 workflow scenarios now directly execute iterator fixture operations via iter_fixture_case steps instead of metadata-only links.
Gate summary now emits deterministic replay_command in pass/fail outputs for reproducible reruns.
